DC CODE § 1-521.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Each plan shall state the number of females and males who are Black, White, Spanish-speaking, Native American, and Asian American, who would, by using the goal of their representation in the available work force in the District, be employed by the agency at the actual employment levels in the agency at the time the plan is submitted. Such numbers shall be broken down:
Within each office in the agency; and
Within each pay level of each salary scale in the agency.

These shall be the goals, not the quotas, of the plan. The plan shall also state the actual employment levels in the agency, broken down in the same way as the goals, and the difference between the actual employment and the goals.

subchapter.text: Affirmative Action in District Government Employment.

heading.catch_text: Agency affirmative action plan--Goal of representation; actual employment levels.
